MOST POPULAR TOURS

The Sea Explorer

  • 3 day tours
  • Up to 30 people
  • 2 tour guides
  • Sleep in cozy hotels
  • Difficulty: easy

The snow adventurer

  • 5 day tours
  • Up to 15 people
  • 3 tour guides
  • Sleep in provided tents
  • Difficulty: hard

The forest hiker

  • 7 day tours
  • Up to 40 people
  • 6 tour guides
  • Sleep in provided tents
  • Difficulty: medium
